layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x128
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x128
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x104
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 317x18
          text run at (0,0) width 317: "The table caption should be aligned at the bottom"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,34) size 130x70 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutBlockFlow {caption} at (0,52) size 130x18
          LayoutText {#text} at (30,0) size 70x18
            text run at (30,0) width 70: "CAPTION"
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 128x50
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 128x22
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 40x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 36x18
                text run at (2,2) width 36: "cell 1"

                text run at (2,2) width 36: "cell 2"

                text run at (2,2) width 36: "cell 3"
